comment: @Rilwannajib As i saw recent broadcast message on that virus that Islamic scholars hve done some research on it that Garlic can prevent one from being infected with the virus. Wallah that's my first thought now garlic will b scarce in the market ?

mask of 1500-2k has turned to 5k to 8k,while other countries help each other by making it free or affordable,Nigerians are using tragedy to cash out without considering people at risk that cant afford it. A lot of Nigerians are wicked but you want good leaders?
